attributes.action: Suspending Council Tax Payment due to Coronavirus Economical Impact
attributes.additional_details: Because they have the duty of care to ensure the people of country are able to sustain a living in this difficult times for everyone.
attributes.background: To Suspend Council Tax payments in order to fund needs during the Coronavirus crisis.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
